scripts.build:all: npm run build:ircyr-11ty && npm run build:sigidoc-feind-11ty
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:ircyr-11ty && npm run clean:sigidoc-feind-11ty
scripts.assemble: rm -rf pages/ircyr-11ty pages/sigidoc-feind-11ty && mkdir -p pages && cp -r projects/ircyr-11ty/3-output pages/ircyr-11ty && cp -r projects/sigidoc-feind-11ty/3-output pages/sigidoc-feind-11ty
scripts.relativize: cd pages/ircyr-11ty && npx all-relative . && cd ../sigidoc-feind-11ty && npx all-relative .
